blog.name: madmagic-comic
blog.description:
Kicked out of the Academy of Magic as a teenager before she could finish her studies in witchcraft, Joy Kaplan is a talentless mess, living a life of expedients in the normal world. Although, the place she choose to live in, is pretty far from normal... 
Updates every TUESDAY & THURSDAY

SUPPORT buy a BOOK:
https://gumroad.com/illuminated

summary:
Aquarelle, Harry in a Dress Text by Mariiechan: 
Harry looked pretty in the dress, Tom thought. People would stare at him, but...
caption:
Aquarelle, Harry in a Dress

Text by Mariiechan:


Harry looked pretty in the dress, Tom thought. People would stare at him, but it wasn’t done in disgust.

Harry was cute in a way.

Then suddenly harry sropped holding Tom’s hand and stepped forward facing Tom.

“Sir do you want to take me on a date”

“Pardon?”

“A proper one,” Harry said while sighing, “All you have ever done was stare at me, this is a date is it not?” Harry said and crossed his arms.

“Yes it’s a date” Tom said and took Harry’s arm.

“Let me show you,” Tom paused, “How a proper date is done”.

Deviantart :LadyZombiedraws

body:
3 AM shenanigans

I was trying so hard to be quiet as i took a pee at three in the morning and my brain chose that moment to remember “roonil wazlib” “that’s my nickname” and i snorted so loud i scared my sister next door

blog.name: wutheringweasley
blog.title: sweet birthday baby
blog.description: bex // xxii // multifandom martini with a hp twist // accidentally obsessed with remus lupin

body:
warning: uninteresting drivel ahead

Guess who played cards against muggles last night for the first time!!!!


I’m gonna need my own set because it was the best game EVER. I think it’s made my friends veeery aware of how much I know about hp. Through that game we ended up sharing who are favourite marauders are. Their response to Remus being mine? “I didn’t think he’d be your type” 😂😂😂 I’ve changed I go for sweet, protective werewolves with a complex now. Thought you knew.

summary: what’s it like for vegan wizards in the harry potter universe?  what do they do about their wands which generally have animal...
body: what’s it like for vegan wizards in the harry potter universe? what do they do about their wands which generally have animal parts in them? how devastating must it be to an 11 year old vegan witch in olivanders to match to a dragon heartstring wand? what about potions, don’t those usually have animal parts as ingredients? do they even have vegan substitute potions for everything?

summary: Jacob’s sibling hanging out in the forbidden forest looking for cursed vaults?? obviously. Jacob’s sibling causing a commotion...
body:
Jacob’s sibling hanging out in the forbidden forest looking for cursed vaults?? obviously. Jacob’s sibling causing a commotion for just walking into the great hall with a pale expression to grab unto one of their friends and bolt into the corridor?? every day. Jacob’s sibling making each and every professor worry for their wellbeing and the rest of the castle because this tiny kid lives in the shadow of their missing brother and everyone likes to poke fun at that?? yes. Jacob’s sibling becoming an urban legend at hogwarts for being known to be searching for the vaults and the teachers won’t dare stop them when they see the constant fire burning in their eyes?? hell yeah. Jacob’s sibling not being the troublemaker their brother was but being kind, brave and smart as he was but no one saw it because he was mad wasn’t he?? always. Jacob’s sibling being anything but mad for searching for vaults that unleash curses on the grounds of the school and terrifying monsters just so they can fnd a clue for their brother?? yes yes yes yes because they will do anything, anything!!! to find their brother

Jacob’s sibling stopping their crazed search to protect their friends because they insist on coming on these crazy adventures? yes, because as much as they love their brother, they wouldn’t sacrifice their other loved ones. over their dead body

That’s who jacob’s sibling is. Not some mad girl or boy, but a kid trying to find their brother & protect their beautiful friends. 

They care so much, they bleed from it

summary:
"I mark the hours, every one, Nor have I yet outrun the Sun.
My use a value, unto you, Are gauged by what you have to do."

tags: i know the book said he landed on his back but work with me here for the sake of composition
summary: A Red-Gold Glow Not much explanation needed here, I don’t think. This was the last piece of Harry Potter fanart I ever finished,...
caption:
A Red-Gold Glow

Not much explanation needed here, I don’t think. This was the last piece of Harry Potter fanart I ever finished, back in 2007 right after Deathly Hallows was published. 

While digging through my old external HD I came across an unfinished piece of a broomstick flying Harry trying to grab Ravenclaw’s diadem from the burning Room of Requirement… and I still really like it. I need to finish it someday. 

deviantART | Twitter | Instagram | Print Orders | Buy Me a Coffee

PLEASE DO NOT REPOST OR REMOVE ARTIST COMMENTS

blog.description: Have some fun whilst visiting me, feel free to do whatever and i love you okay? You are safe and loved here.

summary: Reading the Harry Potter series for the first time
title: Reading the Harry Potter series for the first time
body:
So hello there kids. Now to start things off, I’ve never actually read the Harry Potter books, nor watched any of the films…

Now before you start to panic hear me out! Growing up I was never allowed to read or watch anything related to magic or witches, for it was “too demonic and terrifying for our impressionable children”, so I never read the Potter series or any other books like Percy Jackson etc. (yet thinking back I was allowed to read Narnia sooooo idk). Being the nerd I was as a child (and still am, a child that is), always having my head shoved in a book instead of making friends, I was very disappointed I couldn’t jump on the bandwagon with every other ten year old. But there is hope! I was curious of the fandom, became friends with people who are diehard potter heads and went to Tumblr for answers, so I knew I knew the rabbit hole I’d be flinging myself into.

So here I am, making up for lost time and reading through the series! The books arrived yesterday and are so beautiful, I was so bloody excited. I’ve already finished Philosophers stone and the Chamber of secrets and HOLY SHIT. I’m sucked in and never ever leaving.

I had an idea about this though, why don’t I document my thoughts here? I can post reviews, my thoughts of the plot as I read and the characters I encounter through each page (since I know absolutely nothing and am going in blind, unlike most people my age). I feel like it would fun and interesting as hell for not only me but for you lot who already know the world of Harry potter inside out. Even ask me questions if you like.

Welp hope this turns out alright and that you lot enjoy,
